title: 自建数据集出现错误cv2.error
body:
出现如下错误：
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "crnn_main_v2.py", line 187, in <module>
    main(crnn, train_loader, val_loader, criterion, optimizer)
  File "crnn_main_v2.py", line 117, in main
    train(crnn, train_loader, criterion, Iteration)
  File "crnn_main_v2.py", line 90, in train
    for i_batch, (image, index) in enumerate(train_loader):
  File "/home/klwang/Software/anaconda2/envs/tf3-gpu1.8/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 819, in __next__
    return self._process_data(data)
  File "/home/klwang/Software/anaconda2/envs/tf3-gpu1.8/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 846, in _process_data
    data.reraise()
  File "/home/klwang/Software/anaconda2/envs/tf3-gpu1.8/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_utils.py", line 369, in reraise
    raise self.exc_type(msg)
cv2.error: Caught error in DataLoader worker process 0.
Original Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/klwang/Software/anaconda2/envs/tf3-gpu1.8/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/utils/data/_utils/worker.py", line 178, in _worker_loop
    data = fetcher.fetch(index)
  File "/home/klwang/Software/anaconda2/envs/tf3-gpu1.8/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/utils/data/_utils/fetch.py", line 44, in fetch
    data = [self.dataset[idx] for idx in possibly_batched_index]
  File "/home/klwang/Software/anaconda2/envs/tf3-gpu1.8/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/utils/data/_utils/fetch.py", line 44, in <listcomp>
    data = [self.dataset[idx] for idx in possibly_batched_index]
  File "/home/klwang/download/crnn_chinese_characters_rec/dataset_v2.py", line 65, in __getitem__
    image = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
cv2.error: OpenCV(4.1.1) /io/opencv/modules/imgproc/src/color.cpp:182: error: (-215:Assertion failed) !_src.empty() in function 'cvtColor'
大概是哪里出问题了？
